https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wvildkyo1ftF8O3HVNjMYEOOWof.jpg The golden age of the annual Tony Awards ceremony lasted from 1967 to 1986 â€” the period during which Alexander H. Cohen and his wife, Hildy Parks, were the producers of the show. This film offers a compilation of performances from Tony Award broadcasts during those years. They are presented with color-corrected footage and digitally re-mastered sound. Broadway's Lost Treasures
